form.heading: Form validation
form.text: Praesent id velit volutpat, finibus mi eleifend, molestie enim. Sed non massa nec lectus feugiat sollicitudin ut et nunc. Ut ac felis tellus.

todoList.heading: Todo's
todoList.text:
In this simple 
 application 
 we can add and delete todos from a list. There are several small tests we can do on top of this application, and they illustrate element selection and data handling. In order to cover most cases, we should add a list of items to the todo-list, randomize the list order and then remove the list of items again.

yellowOrRed.heading: Red or yellow
yellowOrRed.text: Click the Generate color button to display a color with a word and then click the button with the correspondent color.

catOrDog.heading: Cat or dog
catOrDog.text: Click the Generate pet button to display an image and then click the button with the correspondent pet.

concatStr.heading: Concatenate strings
concatStr.text: Click the Generate string button to display two strings and then type in the strings together.
